Html:
Hi Radioman,

It seems to have a problem with the end of the dragdrop using the right click.

In fact, when the dragdrop is finished the cursor is default cursor, but if the cursor was not the default one before the dragdrop, there it comes the small "bug".

I thing before the drag drop (right click) it must save the current cursor, and release it after (the right click)... What do you think ?

Thx again for your great job.

Kemanke
